Nick's Blog

iPods and a ninja robbing banks

12 September 2006

This sounds like something out of a movie, but because it is on the internet, it must be true.

Ninja bank robber finally runs out of moves

In other news today Apple swept the internet as it release iTunes 7. I for one welcome our new smooth scrolling, two-way syncing, cover-art downloading, movie selling, ipod upgrading, game playing, aqua styled overlords. I'll even admit to buying both Tetris and Bejeweled for my iPod and playing them on the train on my way home from work.
